Description:
RETIREMENT LIVING AT ITS BEST!
Are you thinking of downsizing? Well consider this well presented 2 bedroom plus a handy study unit in the Aviva Communities Village at Karinya Gardens in Kangaroo Flat.
You will be surprised by how spacious this unit is! Made for low maintenance lifestyle for the over 55's, the large, light filled, open plan kitchen/dining/living is well equipped with electric wall oven, gas cooktop, plenty of cupboards & bench space & big island bench with breakfast bar. The adjacent dining area easily caters for your dining table, a glass sliding door provides access to the covered alfresco/outdoor dining deck. A good-sized carpeted lounge completes this space.
Both bedrooms have built in robes & ceiling fans, whilst the bathroom has an oversized shower & vanity. There is a separate toilet for your convenience. Other internal features are study/craft room with built in desk and cupboards, easy care timber look vinyl flooring, great storage, ducted gas heating, ducted evaporative cooling, split system and ceiling fans.
Moving outside finds an alfresco deck, with bistro blinds, perfect for outdoor dining, 2 garden sheds for extra storage and a single carport. There is a ramp to the front door for easy access.
Set in a quiet street with facilities such as Community Centre with lounge, kitchen, library, meeting room, pool, gym, cinema, workshop/woodworking room & indoor/outdoor bowling green. There is also onsite storage for the boat, caravan, etc.
Close to Lansell Square Shopping Centre for all your shopping needs and transport out the front.
Call today to arrange your inspection.

Description:
A must see!
What an opportunity for those wanting to enter the housing market for the first time, or invest in today's appealing real estate hub in Kangaroo Flat!
Being the rear dwelling of 3, and on its own title with ELEVATED views over High Street, you will find this affordable, stylish and unique three bedroom home.
Freshly painted throughout, it is ready for you to pack your bags and call it home.
Enjoy the openness of the floorplan, with plenty of space in the kitchen/meals and living area, and its own split-system to provide all year comfort.
The main bedroom offers his and her walk-in robe and the bonus of an ensuite, while the two remaining bedrooms both include built-in robes.
The fully landscaped yard and off-street parking is sure to impress.
All of this is within walking distance to Lansell Square, public transport, Kangaroo Flat shops, schools and a short drive to Bendigo CBD. Estimated weekly rental of $310 per week.
Call today to arrange an inspection!

Description:
Beautifully Renovated In Convenient Location
This newly renovated home will not disappoint. All within a short stroll of the the main shops of Kangaroo Flat, railway station, schools, pool, gym, lake, reserve and more.
The modern rendered look facade and large street frontage on a corner block gives it fantastic street appeal.
There are three good sized bedrooms, all with great built in robes. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout the home to ensure year round comfort.
Spacious open plan kitchen/living/dining with new floating floorboards and modern kitchen boasting stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage and bench space.
The bathroom and laundry have both been redone, the whole house has been freshly painted, new tiles to the hall and wet areas.
Spanning across the back of the house is a decked entertaining area which provides a great spot for a drink or BBQ with friends and family. There's also space for a fire pit looking out onto the landscaped and easy to maintain backyard. Backyard is fully enclosed with side access and a large garden shed out of sight.
There is a lengthy single remote-control garage as well as spot for cars in front and plenty of off and on street parking for all your friends and family.
All the hard work has been done, it's just waiting for you to come and enjoy!
Don't miss out, enquire today.
- 3 good sized bedrooms all with great BIR's
- Spacious and light filled open plan living
- Modern kitchen with stone benchtops & stainless-steel appliances
- Newly renovated bathroom and laundry
- New flooring throughout & clever split-level design
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
- Undercover deck spanning rear of house
- Secure yard with large garden shed
- Single long garage with plenty of space for extras in front
- Large frontage and corner block with side access
- Within 500m to Kangaroo Flat shops, train station & St Monicas Primary
- Perfect first home or downsizer

Description:
LIVE LIFE AT THE TOP
Taste, style and quality are the hallmark of this enviably situated, 5 year old home in Kangaroo Flat. Perched on the highest point of the Byambee Rises Estate, it brings with it breathtaking leafy views of iconic Bendigo and its surrounds.
On arrival, you are greeted with beautifully landscaped gardens made up of grass, rocks, and a selection of drought hardy plants – bare maintenance is required to keep it looking manicured. An extended concrete driveway provides access to the rear of the property, and allows the added bonus of extra vehicle parking. The double garage has a black concreted surface with built in storage cupboards and internal entrance. There is also a separate door to allow access to the backyard. Two stack stone feature balustrades on the front portico offer an inviting entrance. Once you walk through the double front doors, the craftsmanship and attention to detail is evident in every aspect of the build. To ensure there is balance, bold, clean lines and modern colours work in harmony with a home that feels calm, organised and inviting. The grand entrance introduces a stair case and two rooms – a theatre room to the left, with the inclusions of a projector / screen, and a fully wired surround sound system. The room presents warm, bold colours that attract the eye and has the ability to be closed off if necessary. To the right of the entrance is the guest wing. It includes a main bedroom, semi-ensuite and walk in robe. The carpet lined timber stair case, winds its way up to the second level where you are presented with three more bedrooms. The main bedroom opens out to the covered front balcony where you can enjoy spectacular views of the sunset. The main ensuite is remarkable. Crisp, white décor with charcoal timber grain finish cabinetry and floor to ceiling tiles. It holds a double shower, double vanity and an abundant amount of well-designed storage. A walk in robe completes this exquisite set-up. Two more bedrooms include a cleverly hidden walk in robe and both have access to the large back balcony. The second level also includes a large lounge area, walk in linen cupboard, 3 piece bathroom and separate toilet. The spacious kitchen boasts a large bench with a luxurious Caesar stone benchtop, cascading down the end to meet the ceramic tiled floor. The extended length of the countertop, allows for plenty of seating room to enjoy a casual breakfast bite. The open-plan design of this impressive space is ideal for the family that loves to cook and enjoy good food. The spacious, light-filled living and dining room features a gas log fire and opens out to a fabulous private outdoor entertaining precinct – which is where the fun begins. Step out from the kitchen area onto the expansive undercover pergola where you will find a built in BBQ with all the trimmings – including stainless steel benchtops, bar fridge, and sink. Designer, tropical inspired ceiling fans catch your eye, evoking a relaxed holiday style vibe. Adjoining this peaceful lounge area is a scintillating 10 x 4 in ground, self-cleaning, salt water swimming pool that is surrounded by glass fencing. On the adjacent side of the pool, the kids will discover a playground wonderland. Lush green grass surrounding an amazing raised cubby house that was built to replicate the main abode. This area of the property also includes a man cave like no other – a shed with tiled flooring, a separate entertaining area protected by a quality assembled shade sail, wood fire, and side driveway access where you could perhaps park a caravan or boat. Perhaps the most exclusive part of the backyard is the Pool House. The owners have many favourite features in the home, but the Pool House is a standout for them. It contains a bathroom, bar, entertainment system, refrigerated air conditioning, ceiling fans, lounge area and bi-fold doors that open up the pool house to the swimming pool.
Insights: 16 Arilpa Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
QUALITY LIVING IN A QUIET AREA WITH GARDENS AND SPACE!
Beautiful landscaped gardens, a generous multi living area residence perfect for growing families and fabulous alfresco entertaining area to create an irresistible family package in this quiet street just moments from amenities in Kangaroo Flat and Bendigo.
Multiple living space comes in the form of second lounge off the entrance hallway, spacious open plan meals/family zone with direct access to the alfresco. All 3 bedrooms have robes (master with walk-in robe and sleek ensuite), while a zoned family bathroom and bright laundry complete the picture.
A spacious alfresco area is perfect for summer entertaining, while finishing touches include ducted heating, split system, evaporative cooling, 3-phase power and a double garage, side access to a large well fitted out shed with separate workshop/storage area. This is ideal for caravan and/or boat.
The position is ideal for people wanting to go walking/running through the state forest.

Description:
QUALITY LIVING IN A QUIET AREA WITH GARDENS AND SPACE!
Beautiful landscaped gardens, a generous multi living area residence perfect for growing families and fabulous alfresco entertaining area to create an irresistible family package in this quiet street just moments from amenities in Kangaroo Flat and Bendigo.
Multiple living space comes in the form of second lounge off the entrance hallway, spacious open plan meals/family zone with direct access to the alfresco. All 3 bedrooms have robes (master with walk-in robe and sleek ensuite), while a zoned family bathroom and bright laundry complete the picture.
A spacious alfresco area is perfect for summer entertaining, while finishing touches include ducted heating, split system, evaporative cooling, 3-phase power and a double garage, side access to a large well fitted out shed with separate workshop/storage area. This is ideal for caravan and/or boat.
The position is ideal for people wanting to go walking/running through the state forest.

Description:
Beautifully renovated and on the Melbourne side of Bendigo
Unassuming is the facade of this surprise package. You just won't believe how beautiful this home is on the inside. Cream brick homes have a great reputation for being quality built and this one is no different but add to that a superb renovation to the interior and you're bound to be impressed. The current owners renovated the home with the thought of staying but, lucky for us, things change and they've decided to sell! Take advantage of this great opportunity to enjoy the fruits of their labour.
Not only are we on the Melbourne side of Bendigo but we're within walking distance of shops, schools, medical facilities, walking tracks, public transport including the Kangaroo Flat train station as well as being a only hop, skip and jump away from the newly completed Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre.
The list of features is extensive including:
- Polished hardwood floors in the living areas combined with crisp white walls and a few remaining features of the original home
- 2 x living areas. An open plan kitchen, dining and family space and another living room. Ideal for family living
- An attractive kitchen with concrete bench tops, soft close drawers and a 600mm stainless steel oven and gas cooktop
- An entertainer's dream, the home has two outdoor living areas. Both conveniently located off the kitchen dining area
- The main bedroom has a walk-in robe and stylish ensuite, bedrooms two and three have built-in robes
- The main bathroom is fresh and stylish with floor to ceiling tiled walls and is comprised of shower, vanity and bath
- A huge European style laundry is a great use of space. The size of this laundry could almost rival a standard one
- Climate control is catered for by way of ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling
- A single carport with remote roller door access allows vehicle access to the backyard
- The backyard is very private and comes with two garden sheds, both with concrete floors
- The allotment is approximately 571m2 in total and very low maintenance
Take the time to experience what this home has to offer. You won't regret it.
Arrange a private inspection now before it's snapped up.
Insights: 14 Neil Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Big on value for the price.
This is the perfect first home or investment property in a position to match.
The brick veneer, tiled-roof home features updated kitchen and bathroom and offers good, clean accommodation.
Three good-sized bedrooms with walk-in robe to main and built-ins to the other two, sunken lounge with raked ceiling and split system air conditioner.
The dining room doubles as a second living area if desired while the roomy kitchen/meals includes new gas heater, pantry cupboard, gas/electric appliances, brand new dishwasher and island breakfast bar for casual dining.
Three piece bathroom beside the main bedroom, separate laundry, WC and linen/storage cupboards complete the home.
Outside, a crazy stone-paved rear verandah with access from both the lounge and meals area is perfect for outdoor living.
Large block, approx. 858 square metres includes easy-care landscaping, secure backyard, carport and garden shed.
Conveniently located in Kangaroo Flat beside Dower Park and within easy walking distance to Crusoe College, Kangaroo Flat Primary School, St Monica's School, the new Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre, Kangaroo Flat shops and public transport.
Low maintenance property, big on value but low on price with a solid rental history.

Description:
IT'S HARD TO FAULT!
Just in time for Christmas comes this beautifully presented and impeccably maintained weatherboard home, located in a quiet back street within walking distance to Kangaroo Flat schools, shops and amenities, public transport and the popular Lansell Square shopping centre. In fabulous order throughout, and set on a large established block measuring a tick under a quarter acre, the home is ideal for quality home seekers wishing to move in and enjoy with peace of mind and a minimal fuss.
A fully renovated floor plan awaits the lucky buyer, and presentation is a credit to our current owner. The home boasts 3 carpeted bedrooms, all complete with built in robes and ceiling fans. The three piece bathroom has been fully updated and is like brand new, as has the central kitchen which boasts all the mod cons and loads of bench and storage space. Separate living spaces at either end of the home are a key design feature, allowing flexibility within the home. The spacious lounge room at the rear has lovely alfresco views, and has a clever study/office cupboard which is bigger than you think! At the front of the home is the dining/second living space complete with attractive timber floors. Completing the internal layout is the good sized laundry and second toilet, whilst ducted heating/cooling flows throughout and a 2kw solar panel system helps with the electricity bills!
Outside, the 987m2 allotment has been fully landscaped and established. A sheltered outdoor entertaining area is the perfect place to admire your surrounds. Side access is provided thanks to double gates, allowing off street parking for your caravan, boat or trailer. It also provides vehicle access to a huge trademans shed with concrete and power. A secondary shed lies at the back of a functioning greenhouse, meaning all your home handyman/tradesperson needs are fully catered for. Other features include lush green lawn, and healthy veggie patch which will lessen those hefty supermarket bills!
All this in a quiet street next to a pocket park for the kids or grand kids. So many boxes ticked in this neat and tidy homely abode that it is definitely hard to fault! Call now to arrange an inspection

Description:
Easy Care, Contemporary Family Home
This modern and spacious property is ready to become a family home. Located at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac and just minutes to the schools, supermarkets and services of Kangaroo Flat, this beautifully presented house is also less than 10 minutes drive to Maiden Gully. Built less than two years ago by Simmonds Homes, this pristine property ticks all the boxes for low-maintenance, contemporary family living.
The lovely light formal entry sets the scene for the rest of the home, with a stylish neutral finish and clean lines. To one side of the hall is a fabulous master bedroom. The spacious walk-in robe is tucked out of sight behind the bed and the ensuite is truly fabulous. With a walk-in shower, double vanity and separate toilet, this great space also includes a large freestanding bathtub and a glass sliding door opening out to a private deck at the side of the house. At the other end of the house, from a hallway leading off the kitchen, are the remaining three bedrooms. These all include a built-in robe and this end of the property also features a family bathroom, separate toilet and a laundry with access to the side of the home.
The main entry hallway also leads to two fantastic living spaces – a formal lounge and a theatre room – and then down to the third living area: a large open plan kitchen, dining and living room. The kitchen offers high-end fixtures and fittings, along with ample storage space including a walk-in pantry.
A glass sliding door from the dining area opens out to a fantastic alfresco space. This overlooks the neat and tidy backyard with built-in garden beds, lawn and a gravel path that leads to the front of the house and the double garage. Steps in the backyard also lead up to a sunny central courtyard, providing plenty of places in the yard to sit and relax. At the front of the property is additional vehicle parking with a second wide drive, ideal for a buyer looking to store a caravan, boat or trailer.
Additional features include:
- Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted heating throughout
- Modern high-end kitchen appliances including five-burner gas cooktop, 900mm oven and dishwasher
- Secure access from the double garage into the home
- Undercover alfresco with power and lighting
- Great off-street parking
- Access from both sides of the property to the rear garden
With everything beautifully finished, but also offering plenty of scope to make it your own, this lovely property provides space, contemporary design and an excellent family-friendly layout. Close to all amenities, less than 15 minutes to the centre of Bendigo and conveniently located on the Melbourne side of the city, this beautiful home has plenty to offer.

Description:
HASSLE FREE HOME ON HIGH
Much cherished and lovingly cared for over time, this deceptively spacious home has had only one owner since being first built in the 1970's and is rock solid throughout. This has been a family friendly home complete with 3 roomy bedrooms each with ample robe space, plus totally separate bathroom, shower room, toilet and powder room all located nearby. Creating a warm family focus and a great place to gather, the magnificent sunken living and formal dining offers plenty of large sunlit windows inviting outside views and gentle breezes. The heart of any busy home is the kitchen, which in this case is spacious, has been re-modelled and offers handy built-in meals nook for mealtimes on the run, plenty of cupboards and bench space, walk-in pantry and practical servery windows to both dining and the outdoors. With convenient side access to the backyard, double lock-up garage and 4 car carport with roller doors, this secure and thriving garden allows kids and pets the space and freedom to run and play safely. A leisurely stroll to Lansell shopping with Kangaroo Flat shops and recreational facilities close by, there are also a variety of childcare options and schools to choose from. A comfortable and easy to maintain home with loads of options and possibilities!
